name: TESLA ROADSTER 2021
desc: ​The quickest car in the world, with record-setting acceleration, range and performance. As an all-electric supercar, Roadster maximizes the potential of aerodynamic engineering—with record-setting performance and efficiency.

name: BMW i8
desc: ​Hybrid sports cars are increasingly common thanks to electricity's performance-enhancing qualities, but the 2020 BMW i8 is more about looking fast than going fast.
